title: sazonk
author: sazonk
content: Hello Guys Im here as gundam addicted , I collected many grade . And of course i made many customized such as, repainting, scribing, kitbashing and etc.Does anyone like gundam?If yes , we can sharing about experience and tips /trick Thanks

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: Haven't seen Gundam, but I remember watching its parody in one of Gintama's episode  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eJi9YIJ2350I did watch a few mecha animes tho(FLCL and Gurren lagann being one of my favorites in this genre). FLCL is the most bizarre and perkiest anime for me(probably because I was high while I watched it?will have to rewatch it if I get time  ). If Cronenberg ever makes an anime, it will be something like FLCL
